content: Mathieu Fontaine is a Postdoctoral Researcher in RIKEN institute and Guest at Kyoto University. His interest are mainly audio source separation including speech enhancement, source localization and music source separation using probablistic models as heavy-tailed models.

title: Mathieu Fontaine
